title: Functional Game-Based Language Training Program for Talent Development of Female Cricket Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate theoretical background and practical experience required. Possession of foundational vocabulary and communication skills necessary for sports coaching
context.additional_context: A course designed for professional learners, teaching modern training methodologies for talent development of female cricketers. It requires smartphone-centric access in non-PC environments, with a focus on linguistic interaction and expressive skills in training program design.

learning_goals: Learners will design at least three functional game-based training scenarios for talent development of female cricket athletes, integrating linguistic communication strategies required during training.

Learners will propose a comprehensive training program considering interactions among environmental-task-individual factors and apply linguistic expression techniques for effective collaboration within teams.
Learners will create field-applicable training content using smartphones and mobile apps, delivering presentations with concise linguistic expressions to provide clear instructions to athletes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
